A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Huge disappointment. I even had to sign up for this site just to vent. 

The only redeeming feature is Adam Driver. What a mess Disney and Rian Johnson have left for the next director! What they did to the character of Luke shows incredible disregard for the character and all the prior films. Did Rian watch any of them? It's almost unbelievable\, but I saw this trainwreck with my own eyes.

As long as we the consumer keep paying for this BS\, this is what they will serve up. Films with unlikable characters. Films with no continuity or consequence. Films where critics are in fear of giving a truthful review lest they not be given free park hopper tickets to Disneyland. Disney does own 80% of everything now.  RIP Star Wars.
